name: minimallambda
description: Some what Minimal code setup needed to get a AWS Lambda up for testing something, this is not a best practice thing, just a quick thing.

scripts.build: babel src -d build && npm run lint-fix
scripts.package: sam package --s3-bucket  robertcurran-cf-templates --s3-prefix eventBridgePlay  --region eu-west-1 --output-template-file packaged.yaml --profile robertPersonalProd
scripts.deploy: sam deploy --template-file ./packaged.yaml --stack-name eventBridgePlay --region eu-west-1 --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --profile robertPersonalProd
scripts.publish: npm run build && npm run package && npm run deploy && echo Finished!!
